# Withings API Integration

Welcome to the Withings API Integration documentation.


<p align="center">
  <img src="docs/img/logo.svg" alt="Withings Logo" width="200"/>
</p>

## Supported Measurements

- [x] Weight
- [x] Fat Mass
- [x] Muscle Mass
- [x] Water Mass
- [x] Visceral Fat
- [x] Bone Mass
- [x] Lean Mass
- [ ] Standing Heart Rate
- [ ] Vascular Age
- [ ] Basal Metabolic Rate
